name: List
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
List
description: Entry::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of entries.

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all log entries by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Returns the list instance for method chaining.

This method may make several API calls until all log entries are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
hour_ago = (Time.now - 60*60).utc.strftime('%FT%TZ')
recent_errors = "timestamp >= \"#{hour_ago}\" severity >= ERROR"
entries = logging.entries(filter: recent_errors).all
